channel.title: Simplicity is a form of art... - slot

item.title: SLOT'ing the old swig-1
item.description: The SWIG tool helps developers in building interfaces/libraries that can be accessed from many other languages than the ones the library is initially written in or for. The SELinux userland utility setools uses it to provide Python and Ruby interfaces even though the application itself is written in C â€¦
item.dc:creator: Sven Vermeulen
